name: Dumbbell Bicep Curls
instructions: Start standing with a dumbbell in each hand
Bring the dumbbells all the way up to your shoulders by bending your elbows
Reverse the curl slowly and repeat

name: Dips
instructions: Grasp the parallel bars and hop up so your arms are straight
Slowly bend your elbows to lower your body into the Dip until your upper arms are about parallel to the ground
